name: RetrieveLegalHoldPolicies
description:
Retrieve a list of enterprise legal hold policies.

Use this tool to obtain a list of legal hold policies associated with an enterprise. Ideal for managing or reviewing legal compliance requirements.

parameters.name: policy_name_prefix
parameters.description: Limits results to policies where names start with this term. It's case-insensitive.

value_schema.description:
Limits results to policies for which the names start with
this search term. This is a case-insensitive prefix.

parameters.name: response_attributes
parameters.description: A list of attributes to include in the response. Only the specified fields and mini representation fields will be returned.

value_schema.description:
A comma-separated list of attributes to include in the
response. This can be used to request fields that are
not normally returned in a standard response.

Be aware that specifying this parameter will have the
effect that none of the standard fields are returned in
the response unless explicitly specified, instead only
fields for the mini representation are returned, additional
to the fields requested.

parameters.name: pagination_marker
parameters.description: The position marker to start returning results, used for marker-based pagination. Requires `usemarker` to be `true`.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

parameters.name: maximum_items_per_page
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return per page. This controls the number of legal hold policies retrieved in a single request.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.
